ModMetaData.name: [Silerra] High quality textures
ModMetaData.author: Silerra
ModMetaData.description: This mod is a fork of the original HighQualityTextures mod by AUTOMATIC1111. It allows you to load DDS files and change the texture compression rate. The original mod was created to improve the quality of textures in RimWorld, and this fork builds upon that foundation to provide even more features and improvements.
